GxCellEditors

Class GxCellEditorRichSelect

  • java.lang.Object
    • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorAbstract
      • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorSelect
        • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorRichSelect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GxCellEditorInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GxCellEditorBasicBooleanRichSelect

    public class GxCellEditorRichSelect
extends GxCellEditorSelect
    Available in Enhanced Grid only. An alternative to using the browser's select popup for dropdown inside the grid.
    #Enterprise
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher
